title: How Ellis Brooklyn's Bee Shapiro Stays Ahead of Fragrance Trends
description: Watch the full conversation between Bee Shapiro and Fashionista's Beauty & Style Director Steph Saltzman on The Fashionista Network. When beauty veteran Bee Shapiro launched her fragrance brand Ellis Brooklyn 10 years ago, it was in a very different industry. For one, as a longtime beauty ...Continue reading
